Summary Note:
Herrera Soto Navarro and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Herrera Soto Navarro is a 50 year old CEO from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Herrera Soto Navarro and Elena have been married since 2008. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1994, Herrera finished his secondary school education at IES Miguel Hernández Alicante.
Herrera completed his university studies at Pompeu Fabra University in 1997.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 26 years, Herrera Soto Navarro brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Herrera Soto Navarro's first role was as a Research Scientist at Almirall S.A., where he worked diligently from 1999 to 2001 to establish a strong reputation.
At Laboratorios Farmacéuticos ROVI S.A., he held the position of Clinical Trials Manager from 2003 to 2007, making significant contributions to the organization.
He spent 3 years working as a Regulatory Affairs Director at Esteve Teijin Healthcare S.L., refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He worked as a CEO at Esteve Teijin Healthcare S.L. from 2012 to 2025, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 450000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Oviedo, worth 2000000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 6810000 EUR from his late mother, a renowned Neurosurgeon, in 2007.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
